PDB_Tools — YYYYYYY¶

This module provides YYYYY.

Module Syntax¶

Empty.

Module Contents¶

PDB_Tools.extract_pdbs_from_pdb_models(pdb_model_ensemble_path, new_dir, name_template, ref_pdb_path = None)¶

This function reads all models from ‘pdb_model_ensemble_path’ and writes each model as a new pdb to the supplied directory. The new name of the pdbs is: ‘given_name’ + ‘_x.pdb’ where x is the model id. If a reference pdb is supplied, the function will fit the ‘CA’ atoms.

PDB_Tools.get_one_atom_pdb(pdb_path, atom_coord)¶

Write a PDB file which consists of only one C-alpha atom.

Parameters:
  • pdb_path (str) – path of the PDB file to create.
  • atom_coord – coordinates of the C-alpha atom.
Returns:

a PDB object.
